text: Arroyo Barril is a Municipal district of Santa Bárbara de Samaná, Samaná province in the Dominican Republic. It is on the south coast of the Samaná Peninsula, on the coast of Samaná Bay. It was made a municipal district on May 1, 2003. ==Population== In the last national census (2010), the district had a total population of 11,007: 5,591 men and 5,416 women. The urban population was 22% of the total population. ==Economy== The most important economic activities of Arroyo Barril are the same of the province: agriculture, fishing and tourism. The Arroyo Barril Airport is in this place; it is a national airport with flights to other airports in the country. ==References== Category:Settlements in the Dominican Republic Category:2003 establishments in North America Category:2000s establishments in the Dominican Republic
title: Arroyo Barril
